name: Cackler
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Last Laugh: When the cackler dies, it releases a dying laugh that scars the minds of other nearby creatures. Each creature within 10 feet of the cackler must succeed on a DC 11+1d4 + 9 Wisdom saving throw or take 2 (1d4) psychic damage.
traits.Mimicry: The cackler can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 11+1d4 + 9 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Spiked Chain: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
